languages.text: {n}Техножрец молчит некоторое время. Потом его вокс оживает, но звучит хрипло, прерываясь статикой и помехами.{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все. Я лишь слуга его, не в силах изведать, что поразило обитель Бога-Машины. Но я чувствую нарушения в структуре, искажения молекулярного порядка. Этот корабль болен".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец молчит некоторое время. Потом его вокс оживает, но звучит хрипло, прерываясь статикой и помехами.{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все. Я лишь слуга его, не в силах изведать, что поразило обитель Бога-Машины. Но я чувствую нарушения в структуре, искажения молекулярного порядка. Этот корабль болен".

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец молчит некоторое время. Потом его вокс оживает, но звучит хрипло, прерываясь статикой и помехами.{/n} "Омниссия знает все, постигает все. Я лишь слуга его, не в силах изведать, что поразило обитель Бога-Машины. Но я чувствую нарушения в структуре, искажения молекулярного порядка. Этот корабль болен".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and noise.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant, I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense the distortion of the structure, the disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫沉默半晌，随后音阵系统发出了声音。他的声音很嘶哑，充满了静电干扰。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。我只是祂的仆人，我无法辨别究竟是什么袭击了万机之神的居所。但我确实感觉到这里的结构遭到了扭曲，分子的秩序遭到了破坏。这艘船病了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司沉默半晌，随后音阵系统发出了声音。他的声音很嘶哑，充满了静电干扰。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。我只是祂的仆人，我无法辨别究竟是什么袭击了万机之神的居所。但我确实感觉到这里的结构遭到了扭曲，分子的秩序遭到了破坏。这艘船病了。”

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote no dice nada durante un tiempo. Después, el voco cobra vida, pero su voz es ronca y está marcada por interferencias y estática.{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Yo soy solo uno de sus sirvientes. No puedo discernir qué ha sucedido en la morada del Dios Máquina, pero sí percibo una distorsión de su estructura, una deformación del orden molecular. La nave está enferma».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote no dice nada durante un tiempo. Después, el voco cobra vida, pero su voz es ronca y está marcada por interferencias y estática.{/n} «El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo. Yo soy solo uno de sus sirvientes. No puedo discernir qué ha sucedido en la morada del Dios Máquina, pero sí percibo una distorsión de su estructura, una deformación del orden molecular. La nave está enferma».

languages.text: {n}技術司祭はしばらく口を開かなかった。しばらくして彼のヴォクス音声が戻ってきたものの、声はしわがれて、静電気と干渉のせいでガサガサしている。{/n}「万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む。自分は単なる万機神の使いだ。機械神の住処を襲った犯人を見定めることはできない。しかし構造は歪だし、分子の並びはメチャクチャだ。この船は病んでいる」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭はしばらく口を開かなかった。しばらくして彼のヴォクス音声が戻ってきたものの、声はしわがれて、静電気と干渉のせいでガサガサしている。{/n}「万機神はすべを知り、すべてを包む。自分は単なる万機神の使いだ。機械神の住処を襲った犯人を見定めることはできない。しかし構造は歪だし、分子の並びはメチャクチャだ。この船は病んでいる」

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm. Dann springt sein Vox an, aber die Stimme ist heiser, und immer wieder ertönen Rauschen und Interferenzen.{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, versteht alles. Ich bin nur Sein Diener, ich kann nicht ermitteln, was die Wohnstätte des Maschinengotts erfasst hat. Aber ich spüre eine Verzerrung der Struktur, eine Entstellung der molekularen Ordnung. Dieses Schiff ist krank."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm. Dann springt sein Vox an, aber die Stimme ist heiser, und immer wieder ertönen Rauchen und Interferenzen.{/n} "Der Omnissiah weiß alles, versteht alles. Ich bin nur Sein Diener, ich kann nicht ermitteln, was die Wohnstätte des Maschinengotts erfasst hat. Aber ich spüre eine Verzerrung der Struktur, eine Entstellung der molekularen Ordnung. Dieses Schiff ist krank."

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre reste silencieux l'espace de quelques instants, et lorsqu'il reprend enfin la parole, sa voix est rauque, ponctuée d'interférences et autres parasites.{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Je ne suis guère que son humble serviteur, et le mal qui a frappé l'antre du Dieu-Machine me dépasse. En revanche, je perçois une distorsion structurelle, une perversion de l'ordre moléculaire. De toute évidence, ce vaisseau est malade. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre reste silencieux l'espace de quelques instants, et lorsqu'il reprend enfin la parole, sa voix est rauque, ponctuée d'interférences et autres parasites.{/n} « L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. Je ne suis guère que son humble serviteur, et le mal qui a frappé l'antre du Dieu-Machine me dépasse. En revanche, je perçois une distorsion structurelle, une perversion de l'ordre moléculaire. De toute évidence, ce vaisseau est malade. »

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip bir müddet sessiz kalıyor, ardından voksu canlanıyor ama sesi kısık çıkıyor. Hışırtılı ve bozuk sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih, her şeyi bilen ve anlayandır. O'na yalnız hizmet ederim, Makine Tanrı'nın meskenine ne olduğunu bilemem. Fakat yapıda bir bozunum, moleküler diziliminde bir yanlışlık seziyorum. Bu gemi, hasta."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest says nothing for a while. Then his vox comes to life, but the voice is hoarse, punctuated by static and interference.{/n} "The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all. I am merely His servant; I cannot discern what has stricken the abode of the Machine God. But I do sense a distortion of the structure, disfigurement of the molecular order. This ship is sick."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip bir müddet sessiz kalıyor, ardından voksu canlanıyor ama sesi kısık çıkıyor. Hışırtılı ve bozuk sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih, her şeyi bilen ve anlayandır. O'na yalnız hizmet ederim, Makine Tanrı'nın meskenine ne olduğunu bilemem. Fakat yapıda bir bozulma, moleküler diziliminde bir yanlışlık seziyorum. Bu gemi, hasta."
